DOC.HEADLINE: RED_CROSS SEEKS HELP FOR FLOOD VICTIMS
DOC.TEXT: The American Red_Cross is seeking donations to help families left temporarily homeless by flooding_in Georgia , Alabama and Florida , a spokeswoman said . Almost 15 # 000 families have been affected by the flooding , which places the disaster among the most severe emergencies for the Red_Cross , spokeswoman Judy Iannacone said . She said that all disaster assistance is free and is made_possible by donations . Checks made to the American Red_Cross Disaster Relief Fund may be sent to P.O. Box 11364 , Santa Ana , Calif . 92711-1364 .
